verses.verse: A <S%H7892>Song<s%> of <S%H4609>degrees.<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> you the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> you <S%H5650>servants<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> which by <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
<S%H5375>Lift<s%> up your <S%H3027>hands<s%> in the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> and <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> you out of <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>
